document_data.name: Cedric Riker
document_data.mainbody: '''Cedric Riker''' was regent of [[Corwell]] in the [[Moonshae Isles]] in the mid-to-late 3{{rd}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dragon/362/Grand History of the Realms: The Moonshaes|32}}
document_data.Relationships: He inherited his position from his father, [[Christopher Riker|Christopher]].
document_data.History:
Cedric became regent of Corwell after the death of High King [[Cymrych Hugh]] and the retirement of his father in the {{YearlinkName|250}}. Cymrych's heir, [[Warren Cymrych|Warren I]] was still a child, and this led to disorganization among the kingdoms of the [[Ffolk]]. As Warren I established the [[Cymrych Dynasty]] from [[Caer Callidyrr]], Cedric continued to rule the family's ancestral seat at Corwell as a steward of the [[Hugh Dynasty]].{{Cite dragon/362/Grand History of the Realms: The Moonshaes|26}}

Cedric's tenure as regent outlasted both the reign of High King Warren I (which ended in {{Yearlink|259}}) and the reign of his successor, High Queen [[Tamara Cymrych|Tamara]] ({{Yearlink|263}}), and ended during the time of High King [[Carrig Cymrych I]].
